table.name: vtiger_visadocuments
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_visadocuments` ( `visadocumentsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `document_name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`visadocumentsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_visadocumentscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_visadocumentscf` ( `visadocumentsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`visadocumentsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
